name: Silverfort Risk
description: This plugin supports performing 'Update Silverfort Risk' action for the users available on the 'Silverfort > User Enrollment' page of the Silverfort platform. This plugin does not support fetching data from the Silverfort platform.

configuration.label: Silverfort Base URL
configuration.description: The Base URL for Silverfort platform.

configuration.label: Auth ID
configuration.description: The Silverfort Auth ID. To get the Auth ID, navigate to the 'Silverfort > Settings > Notifications > Custom' page of the Silverfort platform and copy the 'authId' from the Configuration Custom Integration JSON.

configuration.label: Webhook ID
configuration.description: The Silverfort Webhook ID. To get the Webhook ID, navigate to the 'Silverfort > Settings > Notifications > Custom' page of the Silverfort platform and copy the 'webhookId' from the Configuration Custom Integration JSON.
